title: Reviews
description: Reviews & Comments: ADHD is not a 'deficit disorder' and it often bears no resemblance to hyperactivity. A better name is VAST, or variable attention stimulus trait.
cleaned_text: We Have One. ADHD is not purely a disorder; it is a mix of assets and liabilities. A more representative name for the condition is VAST, or variable attention stimulus trait. This new model recognizes the phenomenon of rejection sensitive dysphoria and its flip side "recognition responsive euphoria" — the super-charged response to perceived encouragement. Learn how to harness it here.
